author: Shibani Mahtani
title: Four dead in Waffle House shooting near Nashville - MarketWatch
text:
Four people were killed and two others wounded when a gunman opened fire at a Waffle House outside Nashville around 3:25 a.m. CT Sunday, according to police.
The Nashville Metropolitan Police Department said the gunman was a white male with short hair, who was nude and fled on foot after the shooting at a Waffle House in Antioch, Tenn., which is part of the Nashville metropolitan region. Police in a tweet later said they were drafting murder warrants against Travis Reinking, a 29-year old from Morton, Ill, who is the registered...
